element.name: ID3_MaxGenre
element.short: Number of well-know genres from ID1! specification and Nullsoft extension version 1

element.name: ID3_MaxGenreExtended
element.short: Number of well-know genres from IDV1 specification and Nullsoft extension version 1 and 2

element.name: v1Genres
element.short: Array of string containing well-known genres
element.descr: The index of every string correspond to value of ID3v1 byte genre
